clean place shall keep congregation child israel water separation purification sin gathereth ash heifer shall wash clothe unclean even shall unto child israel unto strange sojourneth among statute ever toucheth dead body man shall unclean seven day shall purify third day seventh day shall clean purify third day seventh day shall clean whosoever toucheth dead body man dead purifieth defileth tabernacle lord soul shall cut israel water separation wa sprinkle upon shall unclean uncleanness yet upon law man dieth tent come tent tent shall unclean seven day every open vessel hath cover bind upon unclean whosoever toucheth one slay sword open field dead body bone man grave shall unclean seven day unclean person shall take ash burn heifer purification sin run water shall put thereto vessel clean person shall take hyssop dip water sprinkle upon tent upon vessel upon person upon touch bone one slay one dead grave clean person shall sprinkle upon unclean third day seventh day seventh day shall purify wash clothe bathe water shall clean even man shall unclean shall purify soul shall cut among congregation hath defile sanctuary lord water separation hath sprinkle upon unclean shall perpetual statute unto sprinkleth water separation shall wash clothe toucheth water separation shall unclean even whatsoever unclean person toucheth shall unclean soul toucheth shall unclean even come joshua say five king find hide cave makkedah joshua say roll great stone upon mouth cave set men keep stay ye pursue enemy smite hindmost suffer enter city lord god hath deliver hand come pas joshua child israel make end slay great slaughter till consume rest remain enter fence city people return camp joshua makkedah peace none move tongue child israel say joshua open mouth cave bring five king unto cave bring forth five king unto cave king jerusalem king hebron king jarmuth king lachish king eglon come pas bring king unto joshua joshua call men israel say unto captain men war go come near put foot upon neck king come near put foot upon neck joshua say unto fear dismay strong good courage thus shall lord enemy ye fight afterward joshua smite slew hang five tree hang upon tree even come pas time go sun joshua command take tree cast cave wherein hide lay great stone cave mouth remain day day joshua take makkedah smite edge sword king thereof utterly destroy soul therein let none remain king makkedah unto king jericho joshua pass makkedah israel unto libnah fight libnah lord deliver also king thereof hand israel smite edge sword soul therein let none remain unto king thereof unto king jericho joshua pass libnah israel unto lachish encamp fight lord deliver lachish hand israel take second day smite edge sword soul therein accord done libnah horam king gezer come help lachish joshua smite people leave none remain lachish joshua pass unto eglon israel encamp fight take day smite edge sword soul therein utterly destroy day accord done lachish joshua go eglon israel lord god hath done unto nation lord god hath fight behold divide unto lot nation remain inheritance tribe jordan nation cut even unto great sea westward lord god shall expel drive sight ye shall posse land lord god hath promise unto ye therefore courageous keep write book law moses ye turn aside therefrom right hand leave ye come among nation remain among neither make mention name god cause swear neither serve bow unto cleave unto lord god ye done unto day lord hath drive great nation strong man hath able stand unto day one man shall chase thousand lord god fighteth hath promise take good heed therefore unto ye love lord god else ye wise go back cleave unto remnant nation even remain among shall make marriage go unto know certainty lord god drive nation shall snare trap unto scourge side thorn eye ye perish good land lord god hath give behold day go way earth ye know heart soul one thing hath fail good thing lord god spake concern come pas unto one thing hath fail thereof therefore shall come pas good thing come upon lord god promise shall lord bring upon evil thing destroy good land lord god hath give ye transgress covenant lord god command go serve god bow shall anger lord kindle ye shall perish quickly good land hath give unto joshua gather tribe israel shechem call elder israel head judge officer present god joshua say unto people thus saith lord god israel father zippor king moab arise war israel send call balaam son beor curse would hearken unto balaam therefore bless still deliver hand go jordan come unto jericho men jericho fight amorites perizzites land ye dwell house serve lord people answer say god forbid forsake lord serve god lord god bring u father land egypt house bondage great sign sight preserve u way wherein go among people pass lord drave u people even amorites dwell land therefore also serve lord god joshua say unto people ye serve lord holy god jealous god forgive transgression sin ye forsake lord serve strange god turn hurt consume hath done good people say unto joshua nay serve lord joshua say unto people ye witness ye choose lord serve say witness therefore put away say strange god among incline heart unto lord god cake handful meal barrel little oil cruse behold gather two stick may go dress son may eat die elijah say unto fear go thou hast say make thereof little cake first bring unto make thee thy son thus saith lord god israel barrel meal shall waste neither shall cruse oil fail day lord sendeth rain upon earth go accord say elijah house eat many day barrel meal waste neither cruse oil fail accord word syrian save u alive shall live kill u shall die rise twilight go unto camp syrian come uttermost part camp syria behold wa man lord make host syrian hear noise chariot noise horse even noise great u therefore come may go tell king household come call unto porter city tell say come camp syrian behold wa man neither voice man horse tie ass tie tent call porter tell king house within king arise god ever ever bless thy glorious name exalt bless praise thou even thou art lord alone thou hast make heaven heaven heaven host earth thing therein sea therein thou preservest host heaven worshippeth thee thou art lord god didst choose abram broughtest forth ur chaldee gavest name abraham found heart faithful thee mad covenant give land canaanite hittite amorites perizzites jebusites girgashites give say seed hast perform thy word thou art righteous didst see affliction father egypt heard cry red sea shewedst sign wonder upon pharaoh servant people land thou knewest deal proudly didst thou get thee name day thou didst divide sea go midst sea dry land persecutor thou threwest deep stone mighty water moreover thou leddest day cloudy pillar night pillar fire give light way wherein go thou camest also upon mount sinai spakest heaven gavest right judgment true law good statute commandment mad know unto thy holy sabbath commandedst precept statute law hand moses thy servant gavest bread heaven hunger broughtest forth water rock thirst promisedst go posse land thou hadst swear give father deal proudly harden neck hearken thy commandment refuse obey neither mindful thy wonder thou didst among harden neck rebellion appoint captain return bondage thou art god ready pardon gracious merciful slow anger great kindness forsookest yea make melt calf say thy god bring thee egypt work great provocation yet thou thy manifold mercy forsookest wilderness pillar cloud depart day lead way neither pillar fire night shew light way wherein go thou gavest also thy good spirit instruct withheldest thy manna mouth gavest water thirst yea forty year didst thou sustain wilderness lack nothing clothe wax old foot swell moreover thou gavest kingdom nation didst divide corner possess land sihon land king heshbon land og king bashan child also multipliedst thou star heaven broughtest land concern thou hadst promise father go posse child go possess land thou subduedst inhabitant land canaanite gavest hand king people land might would take strong city fat land possess house full good well digged vineyard oliveyards fruit tree abundance eat fill become fat delight thy great goodness nevertheless disobedient rebel thee cast thy law behind back slew thy prophet testify turn thee work great provocation therefore thou deliveredst hand enemy vex time trouble cry unto thee thou heard heaven accord thy manifold mercy thou gavest saviour save hand enemy rest evil thee therefore left thou land enemy dominion yet return cry unto thee thou heard heaven many time didst thou deliver accord thy mercy testifiedst thou mightest bring unto thy law yet deal proudly hearken unto thy commandment sin thy judgment man shall live withdraw shoulder harden neck would hear yet many year didst thou forbear testifiedst thy spirit thy prophet yet would give ear therefore gavest thou hand people land nevertheless thy great mercy sake thou didst utterly consume forsake thou art gracious merciful god therefore god great mighty terrible god keepest covenant mercy let trouble seem little thee hath come upon u king prince priest prophet father thy people since time king assyria unto day howbeit thou art bring upon u thou hast done right done wickedly neither king prince priest father keep thy law hearken unto thy commandment thy testimony wherewith thou didst testify serve thee kingdom thy great goodness thou gavest large fat land thou gavest neither turn wicked work behold servant day land thou gavest unto father eat fruit thereof good thereof behold servant yieldeth much although affliction cometh forth dust neither doth trouble spring grind yet man bear unto trouble spark fly upward would seek unto god unto god would commit cause doeth great thing unsearchable marvellous thing without number giveth rain upon earth sendeth water upon field set high low mourn may exalt safety disappointeth device crafty hand perform enterprise taketh wise craftiness counsel froward carry headlong meet darkness day time grope noonday night saveth poor sword mouth hand mighty poor hath hope iniquity stoppeth mouth behold happy man god correcteth therefore despise thou chasten almighty maketh sore bindeth woundeth hand make whole shall deliver thee six trouble yea seven shall evil touch thee famine shall redeem thee death war power sword thou shalt hide scourge tongue neither shalt thou afraid destruction cometh destruction famine thou shalt laugh neither shalt thou afraid beast earth thou shalt league stone field beast field shall peace thee thou shalt know come shall return house neither shall place know therefore refrain mouth speak anguish spirit complain bitterness soul sea whale thou settest watch say bed shall comfort couch shall ease complaint thou scarest dream terrifiest vision soul chooseth strangle death rather life loathe would live alway let alone day vanity man thou shouldest magnify thou shouldest set thine heart upon thou shouldest visit every morning try every moment long wilt thou depart let alone till swallow spittle sin shall unto thee o thou preserver men hast thou set mark thee burden dost thou pardon transgression take away iniquity shall sleep dust thou shalt seek morning shall answer bildad shuhite say long wilt thou speak thing long shall word thy mouth like strong wind doth god pervert judgment doth almighty pervert justice thy child sin cast away transgression thou wouldest seek unto god betimes make thy supplication almighty thou wert pure upright surely would awake thee make habitation thy righteousness prosperous though thy begin wa small yet thy latter end greatly increase enquire pray thee former age prepare thyself search father yesterday know nothing day upon earth shadow shall teach thee tell thee utter word heart rush grow without mire flag grow without water whilst yet greenness cut withereth herb path forget god hypocrite hope shall perish whose hope shall cut whose trust shall spider web shall lean upon house shall stand shall hold fast shall endure green sun branch shooteth forth garden root wrap heap seeth place stone destroy place shall deny say see thee behold joy way earth shall others grow behold god cast away perfect man neither help evil doer till fill thy mouth laugh thy lip rejoice hate thee shall clothe shame dwell place wicked shall come nought job answer say know truth man god contend answer one thousand wise heart mighty strength hath harden hath prosper removeth mountain know overturneth anger shaketh earth place pillar thereof tremble commandeth sun riseth sealeth star alone spreadeth heaven treadeth upon wave sea maketh arcturus orion pleiades chamber south doeth great thing past find yea wonder without number lo goeth see passeth also perceive behold taketh away hind say unto doest thou god withdraw anger proud helper stoop much le shall answer choose word reason though righteous yet would answer would make supplication judge call answer yet would believe hearken unto voice breaketh tempest multiplieth wound without cause suffer take breath filleth bitterness speak strength lo strong judgment shall set time plead justify mine mouth shall condemn say perfect shall also prove perverse though perfect yet would know soul would despise life one thing therefore say destroyeth perfect wicked scourge slay suddenly laugh trial innocent earth give hand wicked covereth face judge thereof day swift post flee away see good pass away swift ship eagle hasteth prey say forget complaint leave heaviness comfort daysman betwixt u might lay hand upon u let take rod away let fear terrify would speak fear soul weary life leave complaint upon speak bitterness soul say unto god condemn shew wherefore thou contendest good unto thee thou shouldest oppress thou shouldest despise work thine hand shine upon counsel wicked hast thou eye flesh seest thou man seeth thy day day man thy year day thou enquirest mine iniquity searchest sin thou knowest wicked none deliver thine hand thine hand make fashion together round yet thou dost destroy remember beseech thee thou hast make clay wilt thou bring dust hast thou pour milk curdle like cheese thou hast clothe skin flesh hast fence bone sinew thou hast grant life favour thy visitation hath preserve spirit thing hast thou hide thine heart know thee sin thou markest thou wilt acquit mine iniquity wicked woe unto righteous yet lift head full confusion therefore see thou mine affliction increaseth thou huntest fierce lion thou shewest thyself marvellous upon thou renewest thy witness increasest thine indignation upon change war wherefore hast thou bring forth womb oh give ghost eye see though carry womb grave day cease let alone may take comfort little go whence shall return even land darkness shadow death land darkness darkness shadow death without order light darkness answer zophar naamathite say multitude word answer man full talk justify thy lie make men hold peace thou mock shall man make thee ashamed thou hast say doctrine pure clean thine eye oh god would speak open lip thee would shew thee secret wisdom double know therefore god exacteth thee le thine iniquity deserveth canst thou search find god canst thou find almighty unto perfection high heaven canst thou deep hell canst thou know measure thereof long earth broad sea cut shut gather together hind knoweth vain men seeth wickedness also consider vain men would wise though man bear like wild colt thou prepare thine heart stretch thine hand toward iniquity thine hand put far away let wickedness dwell thy tabernacle shalt thou lift thy face without spot yea thou shalt stedfast shalt fear thou shalt forget thy misery remember water pas away thine age shall clear noonday thou shalt shine forth thou shalt morning thou shalt secure hope yea thou shalt dig thee thou shalt take thy rest safety also thou shalt lie none shall make thee afraid yea many shall make suit unto thee eye wicked shall fail shall escape hope shall give ghost job answer say doubt ye people wisdom shall die understand well inferior yea knoweth thing one mock neighbour calleth upon god answereth understand wisdom strength hath counsel understand behold breaketh build shutteth man open behold withholdeth water dry also sendeth overturn earth strength wisdom deceive deceiver leadeth counsellor away spoil maketh judge fool looseth bond king girdeth loin girdle leadeth prince away spoil overthroweth mighty removeth away speech trusty taketh away understand age poureth contempt upon prince weakeneth strength mighty discovereth deep thing darkness bringeth light shadow death increaseth nation destroyeth enlargeth nation straiteneth taketh away heart chief people earth causeth wander wilderness way grope dark without light maketh stagger like drunken man lo mine eye hath see mine ear hath hear understand ye know know also inferior unto surely would speak almighty desire reason god ye forger lie ye physician value o ye would altogether hold peace wisdom hear reason hearken pleading lip ye speak wickedly god talk deceitfully ye accept person ye contend god good search one man mocketh another ye mock surely reprove ye secretly accept person shall excellency make afraid dread fall upon remembrance like unto ash body body clay hold peace let alone may speak let come wherefore take flesh teeth put life mine hand though slay yet trust maintain mine way also shall salvation hypocrite shall come hear diligently speech declaration ear behold order cause know shall justify plead hold tongue shall give ghost two thing unto hide thee withdraw thine hand far let thy dread make afraid call thou answer let speak answer thou many mine iniquity sin make know transgression sin wherefore hidest thou thy face holdest thine enemy wilt thou break leaf drive fro wilt thou pursue dry stubble thou writest bitter thing makest posse iniquity youth thou puttest foot also stock lookest narrowly unto path thou settest print upon heel foot rotten thing consumeth garment moth eat man bear woman day full trouble cometh forth like flower cut fleeth also shadow continueth doth thou open thine eye upon one bringest judgment thee bring clean thing unclean one see day determine number month thee thou hast appoint bound pas turn may rest till shall accomplish hireling day hope tree cut sprout tender branch thereof cease though root thereof wax old earth stock thereof die grind yet scent water bud bring forth bough like plant man dieth wasteth away yea man giveth ghost water fail sea flood decayeth drieth man lieth riseth till heaven shall awake raise sleep o thou wouldest hide grave thou wouldest keep secret thy wrath past thou wouldest appoint set time remember man die shall live day appoint time wait till change come thou shalt call answer thee thou wilt desire work thine hand thou numb step dost thou watch sin transgression seal bag thou sewest mine iniquity surely mountain fall cometh nought rock remove place water wear stone thou washest away thing grow dust earth thou destroyest hope man thou prevailest ever passeth thou changest countenance sendest away son come honour knoweth bring low perceiveth flesh upon shall pain soul within shall mourn answer eliphaz temanite say wise man utter vain knowledge fill belly east wind reason unprofitable talk speech wherewith good yea thou castest fear restrainest prayer god thy mouth uttereth thine iniquity thou choosest tongue crafty thine mouth condemneth thee yea thine lip testify thee art thou first man wa bear wast thou make hill hast thou hear secret god dost thou restrain wisdom thyself knowest thou know understandest thou u u grayheaded age men much elder thy father consolation god small thee secret thing thee doth thine heart carry thee away thy eye wink thou turnest thy spirit god lettest word go thy mouth man clean bear woman righteous behold putteth trust saint yea heaven clean sight much abominable filthy man drinketh iniquity like water shew thee hear see declare wise men tell father hide unto alone earth wa give strange pass among wicked man travaileth pain day number year hide oppressor dreadful sound ear prosperity destroyer shall come upon believeth shall return darkness wait sword wandereth abroad bread say knoweth day darkness ready hand trouble anguish shall make afraid shall prevail king ready battle stretcheth hand god strengtheneth almighty runneth upon even neck upon thick boss buckler covereth face fatness maketh collops fat flank dwelleth desolate city house man inhabiteth ready become heap shall rich neither shall substance continue neither shall prolong perfection thereof upon earth shall depart darkness flame shall dry branch breath mouth shall go away let deceive trust vanity vanity shall recompence shall accomplish time branch shall green shall shake unripe grape vine shall cast flower olive congregation hypocrite shall desolate fire shall consume tabernacle bribery conceive mischief bring forth vanity belly prepareth deceit job answer say hear many thing miserable comforter ye shall vain word end emboldeneth thee thou answerest also company thou hast fill wrinkle witness leanness rise beareth witness face teareth wrath hateth gnasheth upon teeth mine enemy sharpeneth eye upon gap upon mouth smite upon cheek reproachfully gather lord thine anger lift thyself rage mine enemy awake judgment thou hast command shall congregation people compass thee sake therefore return thou high lord shall judge people judge o lord accord righteousness accord mine integrity oh let wickedness wicked come end establish righteous god trieth heart rein defence god saveth upright heart god judgeth righteous god angry wicked every day turn whet sword hath bend bow make ready hath also prepare instrument death ordaineth arrow persecutor behold travaileth iniquity hath conceive mischief bring forth falsehood make pit digged fall ditch make mischief shall return upon head violent deal shall come upon pate praise lord accord righteousness sing praise name lord high o lord lord excellent thy name earth hast set thy glory heaven mouth therefore hath pour upon fury anger strength battle hath set fire round yet know burn yet lay heart thus saith lord create thee o jacob form thee o israel fear redeem thee call thee thy name thou art form shall shew forth praise thou hast call upon o jacob thou hast weary o israel thou hast bring small cattle thy burn offering neither hast thou honour thy sacrifice cause thee serve offer weary thee incense thou hast buy sweet cane money neither hast thou fill fat thy sacrifice thou hast make serve thy sin thou hast weary thine iniquity even blotteth thy transgression mine sake remember thy sin put remembrance let u plead together declare thou thou mayest justify thy first father hath sin thy teacher transgress therefore profane prince sanctuary give jacob curse israel reproach yet hear o jacob servant israel choose thus saith lord make thee form thee womb help thee fear o jacob servant thou jesurun choose pour water upon thirsty flood upon dry grind pour spirit upon thy seed bless even witness god beside yea god know make grave image vanity delectable thing shall profit witness see know may ashamed hath form god melt grave image profitable nothing behold fellow shall ashamed unto valley son hinnom entry east gate proclaim word shall tell thee say hear ye word lord o king judah inhabitant jerusalem thus saith lord host god israel behold bring evil upon place whosoever heareth ear shall tingle forsake estrange place burn incense unto god neither father know king judah fill place blood innocent build also high place baal burn son fire burn offering unto baal command spake neither come mind therefore behold day come saith lord place shall call tophet valley son hinnom valley slaughter make void counsel judah jerusalem place cause fall sword enemy hand seek life carcase give meat fowl heaven beast earth make city desolate hiss every one passeth thereby shall astonish hiss plague thereof cause eat flesh son flesh daughter shall eat every one flesh friend siege straitness wherewith enemy seek life shall straiten shalt thou break bottle sight men go thee shalt say unto thus saith lord host even break people city one breaketh potter vessel make whole shall bury tophet till place bury thus unto place saith lord inhabitant thereof even make city tophet house jerusalem house king judah shall defile place tophet house upon whose roof burn incense unto host heaven pour drink offering unto god come jeremiah tophet whither lord send prophesy stand court lord house say people thus saith lord host god israel behold bring upon city upon town evil pronounce harden neck might hear word pashur son immer priest wa also chief governor house lord hear jeremiah prophesy thing pashur smite jeremiah prophet put stock high gate benjamin wa house lord come pas morrow pashur bring forth jeremiah stock say jeremiah unto lord hath call thy name pashur magormissabib thus saith lord behold make thee terror thyself thy friend shall fall sword enemy thine eye shall behold give judah hand king babylon shall carry captive babylon shall slay sword moreover deliver strength city labour thereof precious thing thereof treasure king judah give hand enemy shall spoil take carry babylon thou pashur dwell thine house shall go captivity thou shalt come babylon thou shalt die shalt bury thou thy friend thou hast prophesy lie o lord thou hast deceive wa deceive thou art strong hast prevail derision daily every one mocketh since spake cry cry violence spoil word lord wa make reproach unto derision daily say make mention speak name word wa mine heart burn fire house shall become desolation thus saith lord unto king house judah thou art gilead unto head lebanon yet surely make thee wilderness city inhabit prepare destroyer thee every one weapon shall cut thy choice cedar cast fire many nation shall pas city shall say every man neighbour wherefore hath lord done thus unto great city shall answer forsake covenant lord god worship god serve weep ye dead save thee though make full end nation whither scatter thee yet make full end thee correct thee measure leave thee altogether unpunished thus saith lord thy bruise incurable thy wind grievous none plead thy cause thou mayest bind thou hast heal medicine thy lover forget thee seek thee wound thee wind enemy chastisement cruel one multitude thine iniquity thy sin increase criest thou thine affliction thy sorrow incurable multitude thine iniquity thy sin increase done thing unto thee therefore devour thee shall devour thine adversary every one shall go captivity spoil thee shall spoil prey upon thee give prey restore health unto thee heal thee thy wound saith lord call thee outcast say zion man seeketh thus saith lord behold bring captivity jacob tent mercy dwellingplaces city go every man brother hebrew hath sell unto thee hath serve thee six year thou shalt let go free thee father hearken unto neither incline ear ye turn done right sight proclaim liberty every man neighbour ye make covenant house call name ye turn pollute name cause every man servant every man handmaid ye set liberty pleasure return bring subjection unto servant handmaid therefore thus saith incense god therefore mine heart shall sound moab like pipe mine heart shall sound like pipe men kirheres rich hath get perish every head shall bald every beard clip upon hand shall cutting upon loin sackcloth shall lamentation generally upon housetop moab street thereof break moab like vessel wherein pleasure saith lord shall howl say break hath moab turn back shame shall moab derision dismay thus saith lord behold shall fly eagle shall spread wing moab kerioth take strong hold surprise mighty men heart moab day shall heart woman pang moab shall destroy people hath magnify lord fear pit snare shall upon thee o inhabitant moab saith lord fleeth fear shall fall pit getteth pit shall take snare bring upon even upon moab year visitation saith lord flee stand shadow heshbon force fire shall come forth heshbon flame midst sihon shall devour corner moab crown head tumultuous one woe unto thee o moab people chemosh perisheth thy son take captive thy daughter captive yet bring captivity moab latter day saith lord thus far judgment moab concern ammonite thus saith lord hath israel son hath heir doth king inherit gad people dwell city therefore behold day come saith lord cause alarm war hear rabbah ammonite shall desolate heap daughter shall burn fire shall israel heir unto heir saith lord howl o heshbon ai spoil cry ye daughter rabbah gird sackcloth lament run fro hedge king shall go captivity priest prince together wherefore gloriest thou valley thy flow valley o backslide daughter trust treasure say shall come unto behold bring fear upon thee saith lord god host thee ye shall drive every man right forth none shall gather wandereth afterward bring captivity child ammon saith lord concern edom thus saith lord host wisdom teman counsel perish prudent wisdom vanish flee ye turn back dwell deep o inhabitant dedan bring calamity esau upon time visit grapegatherers come thee would leave glean grape thief night destroy till enough make esau bare uncover secret place shall able hide seed spoil brother neighbour leave thy fatherless child preserve alive let thy widow trust thus saith lord behold whose judgment wa drink cup assuredly drunken art thou shall altogether go unpunished thou shalt go unpunished thou shalt surely drink swear saith lord bozrah shall become desolation reproach waste curse city thereof shall perpetual waste hear rumour lord ambassador send unto heathen say gather ye together come rise battle lo make thee small among heathen despise among men thy terribleness hath deceive thee pride thine heart o thou dwellest cleft rock holdest height hill though thou shouldest make thy nest high eagle bring thee thence saith lord also edom shall desolation every one goeth shall astonish shall hiss plague thereof overthrow sodom gomorrah neighbour city thereof saith lord man shall abide neither shall son man dwell behold shall come like lion swell jordan habitation strong suddenly make run away choose man may appoint like appoint time shepherd stand therefore hear counsel lord hath take edom purpose hath purpose inhabitant teman surely least flock shall draw surely shall make habitation desolate earth move noise fall cry noise thereof wa hear red sea behold shall come fly eagle spread wing bozrah day shall heart mighty men edom heart woman pang concern damascus hamath confound arpad hear evil tide fainthearted sorrow sea quiet damascus wax feeble turneth flee fear hath seize anguish sorrow take woman travail city praise leave city joy therefore young men shall fall street men war shall cut day saith lord host kindle fire wall damascus shall consume palace benhadad concern kedar concern kingdom hazor nebuchadrezzar king babylon shall smite thus saith lord arise ye go kedar spoil men east tent flock shall take away shall take curtain vessel camel shall cry unto fear every side flee get far dwell deep o ye inhabitant hazor saith lord nebuchadrezzar king babylon hath take counsel hath conceive purpose arise get unto wealthy nation dwelleth without care saith lord neither gate bar dwell alone camel shall booty multitude cattle spoil scatter wind utmost corner bring calamity side thereof saith lord hazor shall dwell dragon desolation ever shall man abide son man dwell word lord come jeremiah prophet elam begin reign zedekiah king judah say thus saith lord host behold break bow elam chief might upon elam bring four wind four quarter heaven scatter toward wind shall nation whither outcast elam shall come cause elam dismay enemy seek life bring evil upon even fierce anger saith lord send sword till consume set throne elam destroy thence king prince saith lord shall come pas latter day bring captivity elam saith lord word lord spake babylon land chaldean jeremiah prophet declare ye among nation publish set standard publish conceal say babylon take bel confound merodach break piece idol confound image break piece north cometh nation shall make land desolate none shall dwell therein shall remove shall depart man beast day time saith lord child israel shall come child judah together go weep shall go seek lord god shall ask way zion face thitherward say come let u join lord perpetual covenant shall forget people hath lose sheep shepherd cause go astray turn away mountain go mountain hill forget restingplace find devour adversary say offend sin lord habitation mighty expert man none shall return vain chaldea shall spoil spoil shall satisfy saith lord ye glad ye rejoice o ye destroyer mine heritage ye grow fat heifer grass bellow bull mother shall sore confound bare shall ashamed behold hindermost nation shall wilderness dry land desert wrath lord shall inhabit shall wholly desolate every one goeth babylon shall astonish hiss plague put array babylon round ye bend bow shoot spare arrow hath sin lord shout round hath give hand foundation fall wall throw vengeance lord take vengeance upon hath done unto cut sower babylon handleth sickle time sword upon saith lord god bring midst thereof deliver hand stranger execute judgment among ye shall fall sword judge border israel ye shall know lord city shall caldron neither shall ye flesh midst thereof judge border israel ye shall know lord ye walk statute neither execute judgment done manner heathen round come pas prophesy pelatiah son benaiah die fell upon face cry loud voice say ah lord possession therefore say thus saith lord god although cast far among heathen although scatter among country yet little sanctuary country shall come therefore say thus saith lord god even gather people assemble country ye scatter give land israel shall come thither shall take away detestable thing thereof abomination thereof thence give one heart put new spirit within take stony heart flesh give also come unto say son man thou dwellest midst rebellious house eye see see ear hear hear rebellious house therefore thou son man prepare thee stuff remove remove day sight thou shalt remove thy place another place sight may consider though rebellious house shalt thou bring forth thy stuff day sight stuff remove thou shalt go forth even sight go forth captivity dig thou wall sight carry thereby sight shalt thou bear upon thy shoulder carry forth twilight thou shalt cover thy face thou see grind set thee sign unto house israel wa command bring forth stuff day stuff captivity even digged wall mine hand bring forth twilight bare upon shoulder sight morning come word lord unto say son man hath house israel rebellious house say unto thee doest thou say thou unto thus saith lord god burden concerneth prince jerusalem house israel among say sign like done shall done unto shall remove go captivity prince among shall bear upon shoulder twilight shall go forth shall dig wall carry thereby shall cover face see grind eye net also spread upon shall take snare bring babylon land chaldean yet shall see though shall die scatter toward every wind help band draw sword shall know lord shall jerusalem know abomination say thus saith lord god unto jerusalem thy birth thy nativity land canaan thy father wa amorite thy mother hittite thy nativity day thou wast bear thy navel wa cut neither wast thou wash water supple thee thou wast salt swaddle none eye pity thee unto thee compassion upon thee thou wast cast open field lothing thy person day thou wast bear pass thee saw thee pollute thine blood say unto thee thou wast thy blood live yea say unto thee thou wast thy blood live cause thee multiply bud field thou hast increase waxen great thou art come excellent ornament thy breast fashion thine hair grow whereas thou wast naked bare pass thee look upon thee behold thy time wa time love spread skirt thee cover thy nakedness yea sware unto thee enter covenant thee saith lord god thou becamest mine wash thee water yea throughly wash away thy blood thee anoint thee oil clothe thee also broider work shoe thee badger skin gird thee fine linen cover thee silk deck thee also ornament put bracelet upon thy hand chain thy neck put jewel thy forehead earring thine ear beautiful crown upon thine head thus wast thou deck gold silver thy raiment wa fine linen silk broider work thou didst eat fine flour honey oil thou wast exceed beautiful thou didst prosper kingdom thy renown go forth among heathen thy beauty wa perfect comeliness put upon thee saith lord god thou didst trust thine beauty playedst harlot thy renown pouredst thy fornication every one pass wa thy garment thou didst take deckedst thy high place diver colour playedst harlot thereupon like thing shall come neither shall thou hast also take thy fair jewel gold silver give thee mad thyself image men didst commit whoredom tookest thy broider garment coveredst thou hast set mine oil mine incense meat also give thee fine flour oil honey wherewith feed thee thou hast even set sweet savour thus wa saith lord god moreover thou hast take thy son thy daughter thou hast bear unto hast thou sacrifice unto devour thy whoredom small matter thou hast slay child deliver cause pas fire thine abomination thy whoredom thou hast remember day thy youth thou wast naked bare wast pollute thy blood come pas thy wickedness woe woe unto thee saith lord god thou hast also build unto thee eminent place hast make thee high place every street thou hast build thy high place every head way hast make thy beauty abhor hast open thy foot every one pass multiply thy whoredom thou hast also commit fornication egyptian thy neighbour great flesh hast increase thy whoredom provoke anger behold therefore stretch hand thee diminish thine ordinary food deliver thee unto hate thee daughter philistine ashamed thy lewd way thou hast play whore also assyrian thou wast unsatiable yea thou hast play harlot yet couldest satisfy thou hast moreover multiply thy fornication land canaan unto chaldea yet thou wast satisfy therewith weak thine heart saith lord god see thou doest thing work imperious whorish woman thou buildest thine eminent place head every way makest thine high place every street hast harlot thou scornest hire wife committeth adultery taketh stranger instead husband give gift whore thou givest thy gift thy lover hirest may come unto thee every side thy whoredom contrary thee woman thy whoredom whereas none followeth thee commit whoredom thou givest reward reward give unto thee therefore thou art contrary wherefore o harlot hear word lord thus saith lord god thy filthiness wa pour thy nakedness discover thy whoredom thy lover idol thy abomination blood thy child thou didst give unto behold therefore gather thy lover thou hast take pleasure thou hast love thou hast hat even gather round thee discover thy nakedness unto may see thy nakedness judge thee woman break wedlock shed blood judge give thee blood fury jealousy also give thee hand shall throw thine eminent place shall break thy high place shall strip thee also thy clothe shall take thy fair jewel leave thee naked bare shall also bring company thee shall stone thee stone thrust thee sword shall burn thine house fire execute judgment upon thee sight many woman cause thee cease play harlot thou also shalt give hire make fury toward thee rest jealousy shall depart thee quiet angry thou hast remember day thy youth hast fret thing behold therefore also recompense thy way upon thine head saith lord god thou shalt commit lewdness thine abomination behold every one useth proverb shall use proverb thee say mother daughter thou art thy mother daughter lotheth husband child thou art sister thy sister lothed husband child mother wa hittite father amorite thine elder sister samaria daughter dwell thy leave hand thy young sister dwelleth thy right hand sodom daughter yet hast thou walk way done abomination little thing thou wast corrupt thy way live saith lord god sodom thy sister hath done daughter thou hast done thou thy daughter behold wa iniquity thy sister sodom pride fulness bread abundance idleness wa daughter neither strengthen hand poor needy haughty commit abomination therefore take away saw good neither hath samaria commit half thy sin thou hast multiply thine abomination hast justify thy sister thine abomination thou hast done thou also hast judge thy sister bear thine shame thy sin thou hast commit abominable righteous thou yea thou confound also bear thy shame thou hast justify thy sister shall bring captivity captivity sodom daughter captivity samaria daughter bring captivity thy captive midst thou mayest bear thine shame mayest confound thou hast done thou art comfort unto thy sister sodom daughter shall return former estate samaria daughter shall return former estate thou thy daughter shall return former estate thy sister sodom wa mention thy mouth day thy pride thy wickedness wa discover time thy reproach daughter syria round daughter philistine despise thee round thou hast bear thy lewdness thine abomination saith lord thus saith lord god even deal thee thou hast done hast despise oath break covenant nevertheless remember covenant thee day thy youth establish unto thee everlasting covenant thou shalt remember thy way ashamed thou shalt receive thy sister branch turn toward root thereof become vine bring forth branch shoot forth sprig wa also another great eagle great wing many feather behold vine bend root toward shoot forth branch toward might water furrow plantation wa plant good soil great water might bring forth branch might bear fruit might goodly vine say thou thus saith lord god shall prosper shall pull root thereof cut fruit thereof wither shall wither leaf spring even without great power many people pluck root thereof yea behold plant shall prosper shall utterly wither east wind toucheth shall wither furrow grow moreover word lord come unto say say rebellious house know ye thing mean tell behold king babylon come jerusalem hath take king thereof prince thereof lead babylon hath take king seed make covenant hath take oath hath also land israel say father eat sour grape child teeth set edge live saith lord god ye shall occasion use proverb israel behold soul mine soul father also soul son mine soul sinneth shall die man lawful right hath eat upon mountain neither hath lift eye idol house israel neither hath defile neighbour wife neither hath come near menstruous woman hath oppress hath restore debtor pledge hath spoil none violence hath give bread hungry hath cover naked garment hath give forth upon usury neither hath take increase hath withdraw hand iniquity hath execute true judgment man man hath walk statute hath keep judgment deal truly shall surely live saith lord god beget son robber shedder blood doeth like one thing doeth duty even hath eat upon mountain defile neighbour wife hath oppress poor needy hath spoil violence hath restore pledge hath lift eye idol hath commit abomination hath give forth upon usury hath take increase shall live shall live hath done abomination shall surely die blood shall upon lo beget son seeth father sin hath done considereth doeth like hath eat upon mountain neither hath lift eye idol house israel hath defile neighbour wife neither hath oppress hath withholden pledge neither hath spoil violence hath give bread hungry hath cover naked garment hath take hand poor hath receive usury increase hath execute judgment hath walk statute shall die iniquity father shall surely live father cruelly oppress spoil brother violence good among people lo even shall die iniquity yet say ye doth son bear iniquity father son hath done lawful right hath keep statute hath done shall surely live soul sinneth shall die son shall bear iniquity father neither shall father bear iniquity son righteousness righteous shall upon wickedness wicked shall upon wicked turn sin hath commit keep statute lawful right shall surely live shall die transgression hath commit shall mention unto righteousness hath done shall live pleasure wicked die saith lord god return way live righteous turneth away righteousness committeth iniquity doeth accord abomination wicked man doeth shall live righteousness hath done shall mention trespass hath trespass sin hath sin shall die yet ye say way lord equal hear o house israel way equal way unequal righteous man turneth away righteousness committeth iniquity dieth iniquity hath done shall die wicked man turneth away wickedness hath commit doeth lawful right shall save soul alive considereth turneth away transgression hath commit shall surely live shall die yet saith house israel way lord equal o house israel way equal way unequal therefore judge o house israel every one accord way saith lord god repent turn transgression iniquity shall ruin cast away transgression whereby ye transgress make new heart new spirit ye die see vanity unto thee divine lie unto thee bring thee upon neck slay wicked whose day come iniquity shall end shall cause return sheath judge thee place thou wast create land thy nativity pour mine indignation upon thee blow thee fire wrath deliver thee hand brutish men skilful destroy thou shalt fuel fire thy blood shall midst land thou shalt remember lord speak moreover word lord come unto say thou son man wilt thou judge wilt thou judge bloody city yea thou shalt shew abomination say thou thus saith lord god city sheddeth blood midst time may come maketh idol defile thou art become guilty thy blood thou hast shed hast defile thyself thine idol thou hast make thou hast cause thy day draw near art come even unto thy year therefore make thee reproach unto heathen mock country near far thee shall mock thee art infamous much vex behold prince israel every one thee power shed blood thee set light father mother midst thee deal oppression strange thee vex fatherless widow thou hast despise mine holy thing hast profane sabbath thee men carry tale shed blood thee eat upon mountain midst thee commit lewdness thee discover father nakedness thee humble wa set apart pollution one hath commit abomination neighbour wife another hath lewdly defile daughter law another thee hath humble sister father daughter thee take gift shed blood thou hast take usury increase thou hast greedily gain thy neighbour extortion hast forget saith lord god behold therefore smite mine hand thy dishonest gain thou hast make thy blood hath midst thee thine heart endure thine hand strong day shall deal thee lord speak scatter thee among heathen disperse thee country consume thy filthiness thee thou shalt take thine inheritance thyself sight heathen thou shalt know lord word lord come unto say son issue like issue horse thus thou calledst remembrance lewdness thy youth bruise thy teat egyptian pap thy youth therefore o aholibah thus saith lord god behold raise thy lover thee thy mind alienate bring thee every side babylonian chaldean pekod shoa koa assyrian desirable young men captain ruler great lord renowned rid upon horse shall come thee chariot wagon wheel assembly people shall set thee buckler shield helmet round set judgment shall judge thee accord judgment set jealousy thee shall deal furiously thee shall take away thy nose thine ear thy remnant shall fall sword shall take thy son thy daughter thy residue shall devour fire shall also strip thee thy clothe take away thy fair jewel thus make thy lewdness cease thee thy whoredom bring land egypt thou shalt lift thine eye unto remember egypt thus saith lord god behold deliver thee hand thou hatest hand thy mind alienate shall deal thee hatefully shall take away thy labour shall leave thee naked bare nakedness thy whoredom shall discover thy lewdness thy whoredom thing unto thee thou hast go whore heathen thou art pollute idol thou hast walk way thy sister therefore give cup thine hand thus saith lord god thou shalt drink thy sister cup deep large thou shalt laugh scorn derision containeth much thou shalt fill drunkenness sorrow cup astonishment desolation cup thy sister samaria thou shalt even drink suck thou shalt break sherd thereof pluck thine breast speak saith lord god therefore thus saith lord god thou hast forget cast behind thy back therefore bear thou also thy lewdness thy whoredom lord say moreover unto son man wilt thou judge aholah aholibah yea declare unto abomination commit adultery blood hand idol commit adultery also cause son bare unto pas fire devour moreover done unto defile sanctuary day profane sabbath slay child idol come day sanctuary profane lo thus done midst mine house furthermore ye send men come far unto messenger wa send lo come thou didst wash thyself paintedst thy eye deckedst thyself ornament satest upon stately bed table prepare whereupon thou hast set mine incense mine oil voice multitude ease wa men common sort bring sabeans wilderness put bracelet upon hand beautiful crown upon head say unto wa old adultery commit whoredom yet go unto go unto woman playeth harlot go unto aholah unto aholibah lewd woman righteous men shall judge manner adulteress manner woman shed blood adulteress blood hand thus saith lord god bring company upon give remove spoil company shall stone stone dispatch sword shall slay son daughter burn house fire thus cause lewdness cease land woman may teach lewdness shall recompense lewdness upon ye shall bear sin idol ye shall know lord god ninth year tenth month tenth day month word lord come unto say son man write thee name day even day king babylon set jerusalem day utter parable unto rebellious house say unto thus saith lord god set pot set also pour water gather piece thereof even every good piece thigh shoulder fill choice bone take choice flock burn also bone make boil well let seethe bone therein wherefore thus saith lord god woe bloody city pot whose scum therein whose scum go bring piece piece let lot fall upon blood midst set upon top rock pour upon grind cover dust might cause fury come take vengeance set blood upon top rock cover therefore thus saith lord god woe bloody city even make pile fire great heap wood kindle fire consume flesh spice well let bone burn set empty upon coal thereof brass may hot may burn filthiness may melt scum may consume hath weary lie great scum go forth scum shall fire thy filthiness lewdness purge thee thou wast purge thou shalt purge thy filthiness till cause fury rest upon thee lord speak shall come pas go back neither spare neither repent accord thy way accord thy doings shall judge thee saith lord god also word lord come unto say son man behold take away thee desire thine eye stroke yet neither shalt thou mourn weep neither shall thy tear run forbear cry make mourn dead bind tire thine head upon thee put thy shoe upon thy foot cover thy lip eat bread men spake unto people morning even wife die morning wa command people say unto wilt thou tell u thing u thou doest answer word lord come unto say speak unto house israel thus saith lord god behold profane sanctuary excellency strength desire eye soul pitieth son daughter ye leave shall fall sword ye shall done ye shall cover lip eat bread men tire shall upon head shoe upon foot ye shall mourn weep ye shall pine away iniquity mourn one toward another thus ezekiel unto sign accord hath done shall ye cometh ye shall know lord god also thou son man shall day take strength joy glory desire eye whereupon set mind son daughter escapeth day shall come unto thee cause thee hear thine ear day shall thy mouth open escape thou shalt speak dumb thou shalt sign unto shall know lord word lord come unto say son man set thy face ammonite prophesy say unto ammonite hear word lord god thus saith lord god thou saidst aha sanctuary wa profane land israel wa desolate house judah go captivity behold therefore deliver thee men east possession shall set palace thee make dwelling thee shall eat thy fruit shall drink thy milk make rabbah stable camel ammonite couch place flock ye shall know lord thus saith lord god thou hast clap thine hand stamp foot rejoice heart thy despite land execute great vengeance upon furious rebuke shall know lord shall lay vengeance upon come pas eleventh year first day month word lord come unto say son man tyrus hath say jerusalem aha break wa gate people turn unto shall replenish lay waste therefore thus saith lord god behold thee o tyrus cause many nation come thee sea causeth wave come shall destroy wall tyrus break tower also scrape dust make like top rock shall place spread net midst sea speak saith lord god shall become spoil nation daughter field shall slay sword shall know lord thus saith lord god behold bring upon tyrus nebuchadrezzar king babylon king king north horse chariot horseman company much people shall slay sword thy daughter field shall make fort thee cast mount thee lift buckler thee shall set engine war thy wall ax shall break thy tower reason abundance horse dust shall cover thee thy wall shall shake noise horseman wheel chariot shall enter thy gate men enter city wherein make breach hoof horse shall tread thy street shall slay thy people sword thy strong garrison shall go grind shall make spoil thy rich make prey thy merchandise shall break thy wall destroy thy pleasant house shall lay thy stone thy timber thy dust midst water cause noise thy song cease sound thy harp shall hear make thee like top rock thou shalt place spread net upon thou shalt build lord speak saith lord god thus saith lord god tyrus shall isle shake sound thy fall wound cry slaughter make midst thee prince sea shall come throne lay away robe put broider garment shall clothe tremble shall sit upon grind shall tremble every moment astonish thee shall take lamentation thee say thee art thou destroy wast inhabit seafaring men renowned city wast strong sea inhabitant cause terror haunt shall isle tremble day thy fall yea isle sea shall trouble thy departure thus saith lord god shall make thee desolate city like city inhabit shall bring deep upon thee great water shall cover thee shall bring thee descend pit people old time shall set thee low part earth place desolate old go pit thou inhabit shall set glory land live make thee terror thou shalt though thou seek yet shalt thou never find saith lord god hast set thine heart heart god behold therefore bring stranger upon thee terrible nation shall draw sword beauty thy wisdom shall defile thy brightness shall bring thee pit thou shalt die death slay turn turn way shall die iniquity thou hast deliver thy soul therefore o thou son man speak unto house israel thus ye speak say transgression sin upon u pine away live say unto live saith lord god pleasure death wicked wicked turn way live turn ye turn ye evil way ye die o house israel therefore thou son man say unto child thy people righteousness righteous shall deliver day transgression wickedness wicked shall fall thereby day turneth wickedness neither shall righteous able live righteousness day sinneth shall say righteous shall surely live trust righteousness commit iniquity righteousness shall remember iniquity hath commit shall die say unto wicked thou shalt surely die turn sin lawful right wicked restore pledge give rob walk statute life without commit iniquity shall surely live shall die none sin hath commit shall mention unto hath done lawful right shall surely live yet child thy people say way lord equal way equal righteous turneth righteousness committeth iniquity shall even die thereby wicked turn wickedness lawful right shall live thereby yet ye say way lord equal o ye house israel judge every one way come pas twelfth year captivity tenth month fifth israel prophesy say unto thus saith lord god unto shepherd woe shepherd israel fee shepherd fee flock ye eat fat ye clothe wool ye kill feed ye fee flock diseased ye strengthen neither ye heal wa sick neither ye bind wa break neither ye bring wa drive away neither ye seek wa lose force cruelty ye rule scatter shepherd become meat beast field scatter sheep wander mountain upon every high hill yea flock wa scatter upon face earth none search seek therefore ye shepherd hear word lord live saith lord god surely flock become prey flock become meat every beast field wa shepherd neither shepherd search flock shepherd feed feed flock therefore o ye shepherd hear word lord thus saith lord god behold shepherd require flock hand cause cease feed flock neither shall shepherd fee deliver flock shall pursue thee sith thou hast hat blood even blood shall pursue thee thus make mount seir desolate cut passeth returneth fill mountain slay men thy hill thy valley thy river shall fall slay sword thee ruler thou art head gold thee shall arise another kingdom inferior thee another third kingdom brass shall bear rule earth fourth kingdom shall strong iron forasmuch iron breaketh piece subdueth belteshazzar master magician know spirit holy god thee secret troubleth thee tell vision dream see interpretation thereof thus vision mine head bed saw behold tree midst earth height thereof wa great tree grow wa strong height thereof reach unto heaven sight thereof end earth leaf thereof fair fruit thereof much wa meat beast field shadow fowl heaven dwell bough thereof flesh wa feed saw vision head upon bed behold watcher holy one come heaven cry aloud say thus hew tree cut branch shake leaf scatter fruit let beast get away fowl branch nevertheless leave stump root earth even band iron brass tender grass field let wet dew heaven let portion beast grass earth let heart change man let beast heart give unto let seven time pas matter decree watcher demand word holy one intent live may know high ruleth kingdom men giveth whomsoever setteth base men dream king nebuchadnezzar see thou o belteshazzar declare interpretation thereof forasmuch wise men kingdom able make know unto interpretation thou art able spirit holy god thee daniel whose name wa belteshazzar wa astonied one hour thought trouble king spake say belteshazzar let dream interpretation thereof trouble thee belteshazzar answer say lord dream hate thee interpretation thereof thine enemy tree thou sawest grow wa strong whose height reach unto heaven sight thereof earth whose leaf fair fruit thereof much wa meat beast field dwell upon whose branch fowl heaven habitation thou o king art grow become strong thy greatness grow reacheth unto heaven thy dominion end earth whereas king saw watcher holy one come heaven say hew tree destroy yet leave stump root thereof earth even band iron brass tender grass field let wet dew heaven let portion beast field till seven time pas interpretation o king decree high come upon lord king shall drive thee men thy dwell shall beast field shall make thee eat grass ox shall wet thee dew heaven seven time shall pas thee till thou know high ruleth kingdom men giveth whomsoever whereas command leave stump tree root thy kingdom shall sure unto thee thou shalt know heaven rule wherefore o king let counsel acceptable unto thee break thy sin righteousness thine iniquity shew mercy poor may lengthen thy tranquillity come upon king nebuchadnezzar end twelve month walk palace kingdom babylon king spake say great babylon build house kingdom might power honour majesty word wa mouth fell voice heaven say o king nebuchadnezzar thee speak kingdom depart thee shall drive thee men thy dwell shall beast field shall make thee eat grass ox seven time shall pas thee thou know high ruleth kingdom men giveth whomsoever hour wa thing fulfil upon nebuchadnezzar wa drive men eat grass ox body wa wet dew heaven till hair grow like feather nail like bird claw end day continually habakkuk burden habakkuk prophet see o lord long shall cry thou wilt hear even cry unto thee violence thou wilt save dost thou shew iniquity cause behold grievance spoil violence raise strife contention therefore law slack judgment doth never go forth wicked doth compass righteous therefore wrong judgment proceedeth behold ye among heathen regard wonder marvelously work work day ye believe though tell lo raise chaldean bitter hasty nation shall march breadth land posse dwellingplaces terrible dreadful judgment dignity shall proceed horse also swift leopard fierce even wolf every strong hold shall heap dust take shall mind change shall pas offend impute power unto god art thou everlasting o lord god mine holy one shall die o lord thou hast ordain judgment o mighty god thou hast establish correction thou art pure eye behold evil canst look iniquity wherefore lookest thou upon deal treacherously holdest thy tongue wicked devoureth man righteous makest men fish sea slay nation stand upon watch set upon tower watch see say unto shall answer reprove lord answer say write vision make plain upon table may run readeth vision yet appoint time end shall speak lie though tarry wait surely come tarry behold soul lift upright shall live faith yea also transgresseth wine proud man neither keepeth home enlargeth desire hell death satisfy gathereth unto nation heapeth unto people shall take parable taunt proverb say woe increaseth long ladeth thick clay shall rise suddenly shall bite thee awake shall vex thee thou shalt booty unto thou hast spoil many nation remnant people shall spoil thee men blood violence land city dwell therein woe coveteth evil covetousness house may set nest high may deliver power evil thou hast consult shame thy house cut many people hast sin thy soul stone shall cry wall beam timber shall answer woe buildeth town blood stablisheth city iniquity behold lord host people shall labour fire people shall weary vanity earth shall fill knowledge glory lord water cover sea woe unto giveth neighbour drink puttest thy bottle makest drunken also thou mayest look nakedness thou art fill shame glory drink thou also let thy foreskin uncover cup right hand shall turn unto thee shameful spew shall thy glory violence lebanon shall cover thee spoil beast make afraid men blood violence land city dwell therein profiteth grave image maker thereof hath grave melt image teacher lie maker work trusteth therein make dumb idol woe unto saith wood awake dumb stone arise shall teach behold lay gold silver breath midst lord holy everlasting mountain scatter perpetual hill bow way everlasting saw tent cushan affliction curtain land midian tremble wa lord displease river wa thine anger river wa thy wrath sea thou didst ride lift hand high sun moon stand still habitation light thine arrow go shin thy glitter spear thou didst march land indignation thou didst thresh heathen anger thou wentest forth salvation thy people great multitude people galilee decapolis jerusalem judaea beyond jordan see multitude go mountain wa set disciple come unto open mouth teach say bless poor spirit kingdom heaven bless mourn shall comfort bless meek shall inherit earth bless hunger thirst righteousness shall fill bless merciful shall obtain mercy bless pure heart shall see god bless peacemaker shall call child god bless persecute righteousness sake kingdom heaven bless ye men shall revile persecute shall say manner evil falsely sake rejoice exceed glad great reward heaven persecute prophet ye salt earth salt lose savour wherewith shall salt thenceforth good nothing cast tread foot men ye light world city set hill hide neither men light candle put bushel candlestick giveth light unto house let light shine men may see good work glorify father heaven think come destroy law prophet come destroy fulfil verily say unto till heaven earth pas one jot one tittle shall wise pas law till fulfil whosoever therefore shall break one least commandment shall teach men shall call least kingdom heaven whosoever shall teach shall call great kingdom heaven say unto except righteousness shall exceed righteousness scribe pharisee ye shall case enter kingdom heaven ye hear wa say old time thou shalt kill whosoever shall kill shall danger judgment say unto whosoever angry brother without cause shall danger judgment whosoever shall say brother raca shall danger council whosoever shall say thou fool shall danger hell fire therefore thou bring thy gift altar rememberest thy brother hath ought thee leave thy gift altar go thy way first reconcile thy brother come offer thy gift agree thine adversary quickly thou art way l time adversary deliver thee judge judge deliver thee officer thou cast prison verily say unto thee thou shalt mean come thence till thou hast pay uttermost farthing ye hear wa say old time thou shalt commit adultery say unto whosoever looketh woman lust hath commit adultery already heart thy right eye offend thee pluck cast thee profitable thee one thy member perish thy whole body cast hell thy right hand offend thee cut cast thee profitable thee one thy member perish thy whole body cast hell hath say whosoever shall put away wife let give write divorcement say unto whosoever shall put away wife save cause fornication causeth commit adultery whosoever shall marry divorce committeth adultery ye hear hath say old time thou shalt forswear thyself shalt perform unto lord thine oath say unto swear neither heaven god throne earth footstool neither jerusalem city great king neither shalt thou swear thy head thou canst make one hair white black let communication yea yea nay nay whatsoever cometh evil ye hear hath say eye eye tooth tooth say unto ye resist evil whosoever shall smite thee thy right cheek turn also man sue thee law take away thy coat let thy cloak also whosoever shall compel thee go mile go twain give asketh thee would borrow thee turn thou away ye hear hath say thou shalt love thy neighbour hate thine enemy say unto love enemy bless curse good hate pray despitefully use persecute ye may child father heaven maketh sun rise evil good sendeth rain unjust ye love love reward ye even publican ye salute brother ye others even publican ye therefore perfect even father heaven perfect take heed ye alms men see otherwise ye reward father heaven therefore thou doest thine alms sound trumpet thee hypocrite synagogue street may glory men verily say unto reward thou doest alms let thy leave hand know thy right hand doeth thine alms may secret thy father seeth secret shall reward thee openly thou prayest thou shalt hypocrite love pray stand synagogue corner street may see men verily say unto reward thou thou prayest enter thy closet thou hast shut thy door pray thy father secret thy father seeth secret shall reward thee openly ye pray use vain repetition heathen think shall hear much speak ye therefore like unto father knoweth thing ye need ye ask manner therefore pray ye father art heaven hallow thy name thy kingdom come thy done earth heaven give u day daily bread forgive u debt forgive debtor lead u temptation deliver u evil thine kingdom power glory ever amen ye forgive men trespass heavenly father also forgive ye forgive men trespass neither father forgive trespass moreover ye fast hypocrite sad countenance disfigure face may appear unto men fast verily say unto reward thou thou fast anoint thine head wash thy face thou appear unto men fast unto thy father secret thy father seeth secret shall reward thee openly lay treasure upon earth moth rust doth corrupt thief break steal lay treasure heaven neither moth rust doth corrupt thief break steal treasure heart also light body eye therefore thine eye single thy whole body shall full light thine eye evil thy whole body shall full darkness therefore light thee darkness great darkness man serve two master either hate one love else hold one despise ye serve god mammon therefore say unto take think life ye shall eat ye shall drink yet body ye shall put life meat body raiment behold fowl air sow neither reap gather barn yet heavenly father feedeth ye much good shall sit upon twelve throne judge twelve tribe israel every one hath forsake house brother sister father mother wife child land name sake shall receive hundredfold shall inherit everlasting life many first shall last last shall first kingdom heaven like unto man householder go early morning hire labourer vineyard agree labourer penny day send vineyard go third hour saw others stand idle marketplace say unto go ye also vineyard whatsoever right give go way go sixth ninth hour likewise eleventh hour go find others stand idle saith unto stand ye day idle say unto man hath hire u saith unto go ye also vineyard whatsoever right shall ye receive even wa come lord vineyard saith unto steward call labourer give hire begin last unto first come hire eleventh hour receive every man penny first come suppose receive likewise receive every man penny receive murmur goodman house say last work one hour thou hast make equal unto u bear burden heat day answer one say friend thee wrong didst meet cometh twenty thousand else yet great way sendeth ambassage desireth condition peace likewise whosoever forsaketh hath disciple salt good salt lose savour wherewith shall season neither fit land repenteth ninety nine person need repentance either woman ten piece silver lose one piece doth light candle sweep house seek diligently till find hath find calleth friend neighbour together say answer two hundred pennyworth bread sufficient every one may take little one disciple andrew simon peter brother saith unto lad hath five barley loaf two small fish among many jesus say make men sit wa much grass place men sit number five thousand jesus take loaf give thank distribute disciple disciple set likewise fish much would fill say unto disciple gather fragment remain nothing lose also ashamed gospel christ power god unto salvation every one believeth jew first also greek therein righteousness god reveal faith faith write shall live faith wrath god reveal heaven ungodliness unrighteousness men hold truth unrighteousness may know god manifest god hath shew unto invisible thing creation world clearly see understand thing make even eternal power godhead without excuse know god glorify god neither thankful become vain imagination foolish heart wa darken profess wise become fool change glory uncorruptible god image make like corruptible man bird fourfooted beast creep
